detectors.description:
Reentrancy in TetherGroundUSDToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (contracts/TetherGroundUSDToken.sol#214-252):
	External calls:
	- rateLimitManager.updateLastTransferTime(from) (contracts/TetherGroundUSDToken.sol#228)
	- rateLimitManager.updateLastTransferBlock(from) (contracts/TetherGroundUSDToken.sol#229)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _approve(from,msg.sender,currentAllowance - amount) (contracts/TetherGroundUSDToken.sol#240)
		- _allowances[owner][spender] = amount (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#312)
	ERC20._allowances (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#41) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ERC20._approve(address,address,uint256) (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#308-314)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#122-124)
detectors.markdown:

	- [rateLimitManager.updateLastTransferBlock(from)](contracts/TetherGroundUSDToken.sol#L229)
	State variables written after the call(s):

		- [_allowances[owner][spender] = amount](node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#L312)
	[ERC20._allowances](node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#L41) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- [ERC20._approve(address,address,uint256)](node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#L308-L314)
	- [ERC20.allowance(address,address)](node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol#L122-L124)
